web_snippets: Nicolas Véron is a senior fellow at Bruegel and at the Peterson Institute for International Economics in Washington, DC.
Nicolas Véron is a French economist. He is a senior fellow at Bruegel in Brussels, which he co-founded in 2002–05, and at the Peterson Institute for ...
Nicolas Véron, senior fellow, joined the Peterson Institute for International Economics in October 2009. Véron is also a senior fellow at Bruegel.
